oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Economic Efficiency of the Winter Wheat (Triticum aestivum L.) and Winter Spelt (Triticum spelta L.) Growing in Organic Farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sramek, Jan
Konvalina, Petr
Zdrhova, I.
Moudry, Jan (Jr.)
Moudry, Jan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Comparison of economic efectivity of the winter wheat (Triticum aestivum L.) and winter spelt (Triticum spelta L.) growing in organic farming systems. The differences of yield of two species wheats in organic farming system and factors are evaluated. In relation to standart technological procedures in farming systems are defined costs for area nad for production unit. Structure of costs on production, price differences between the winter wheat and winter spelt are analysed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Sramek, Jan; Konvalina, Petr; Zdrhova, I.; Moudry, Jan (Jr.) and Moudry, Jan (2009) Economic Efficiency of the Winter Wheat (Triticum aestivum L.) and Winter Spelt (Triticum spelta L.) Growing in Organic Farming. Lucrări Ştiinţifice, Seria Agronomie, 11 (1), pp. 125-130.
